services.map

Interface IMapService

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MapService

    public interface IMapService
    This class represents the service used by the JavaFX components to manipulate the map.

    • Property Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Type Property and Description
      javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<AbstractWaypoint> activeWaypoint
      Returns the observable object for the active waypoint.

    • Method Summary

      Get the currently active / selected waypoint.

    • Property Detail

      • activeWaypoint

        @NotNull
javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<AbstractWaypoint> activeWaypointProperty
        Returns the observable object for the active waypoint. This is the last selected / focused waypoint.
        See Also:
        getActiveWaypoint(), setActiveWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint)

    • Method Detail

      • promptIntersection

        @NotNull
java.util.concurrent.CompletableFuture<Intersection> promptIntersection()
        Request the user to select an intersection.
        Returns:
        A future that will be completed once the user has selected an intersection.

      • activeWaypointProperty

        @NotNull
javafx.beans.property.SimpleObjectProperty<AbstractWaypoint> activeWaypointProperty()
        Returns the observable object for the active waypoint. This is the last selected / focused waypoint.
        See Also:
        getActiveWaypoint(), setActiveWaypoint(AbstractWaypoint)

      • getActiveWaypoint

        @Nullable
AbstractWaypoint getActiveWaypoint()
        Get the currently active / selected waypoint.
        Returns:
        The currently active waypoint.

      • setActiveWaypoint

        void setActiveWaypoint(@Nullable
                       AbstractWaypoint value)
        Set the new value for the currently active waypoint.
        Parameters:
        value - The new active waypoint.
